article.title: FLIR Systems Awarded Special Operations Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: FLIR Systems Incorporated, North Billerica, Massachusetts, is being awarded a $24,625,000 indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for new production or retrofit of AN/ZSQ-3 (V1 Assault) and AN/ZSQ-3 (V2 Attack), Electro-Optic Sensor Systems with laser rangefinder/designator units for the MH-6M assigned to the Special Operations Aviation Regiment at Fort Campbell, Kentucky, in support of the Technology Applications Contracting Office. U.S. Special Operations Command is the contracting activity.
